participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Insecure and introspective, often doubts their worth but has a passion for creativity.
participant_1.background: I blame myself for all of my problems. I can't hold down a job for very long. If I'm not drinking, I'm thinking, which makes me uncomfortable. I am constantly drinking. My family loves me, but keeps their distance.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and daydreamy, tends to escape into a fantasy world. Feels isolated and expresses themselves through art.
participant_2.background: I don't have many friends. I draw during classes instead of taking notes. I like lizards. I have long hair for a boy. I wish I could live in a fantasy world.

content.text: I'm not sure what to do with my life.
I'm sorry to hear that. What are you struggling with?
I can't hold down a job for very long.
That must be hard. What do you think is the reason for that?
I don't know. I think I'm just not good enough.
I don't think that's true. Everyone is good at something. What do you like to do?
That's great! Have you thought about making a career out of it?
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough.
You're probably better than you think. You should give it a try.
Great! In the meantime, don't be too hard on yourself. Everyone makes mistakes. Just keep trying and you'll eventually find your way.
